urls.title: ICE-CIWEM Yorkshire and Humber Flooding Conference
urls.description: Flooding is a major challenge right across Yorkshire and Humber, from the short steep catchments in the Yorkshire Dales to the flat lowlands to the east of the region. The conference will focus on discussing a range of approaches being used to reduce flood risk in the region and ensuring that the region becomes more resilient to flooding and adapting for climate change in the future. ¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†¬†
